projects.name: 3D Kinematic Plate Model
projects.summary: Invert for fault slip rates (strike-slip and dip-slip motions) and interseismic locking distributions on faults constrainted by short-term horizontal (GPS), short-term vertical (GPS and leveling), and long-term vertical (Rock uplift, river incision) rates using a Bayesian approach.

projects.name: Multiple Timescales 2D Kinematic Cross-section Model
projects.summary: Testing the present-day geodetic record on several million-year timescale thermochronology cross-section geometry to constrain the forward output of the cross-section.

projects.name: Surface Velocity Field in Southwestern Taiwan
projects.summary: Build a 3-Dimension short-term velocity field in over 12,000 square kilometers in southwestern Taiwan by fusing PSInSAR and GPS data implemented with SNAP and StaMPS.
